participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic with a love for unique hobbies.
participant_1.background: i love cats and have two cats. my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about sports and fitness.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i am a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.
